channel.title: No option for disabling viewmodel bloodstains
channel.description: I remember some developer saying that he will include an option for this in Steam release, but there isn't. ( cl_mdldetailfx_enable 0 )

item.title: No option for disabling viewmodel bloodstains

item.description:
I would be glad to have this in the game as a setting.

Read full topic
